name: 3rd World Conference on Psychology and Behavioral Sciences
content: The 3rd World Conference on Psychology and Behavioral Sciences is a prestigious global event, uniting top professionals, scholars, and researchers in the fields of Psychology and Behavioral Sciences. This conference offers a platform for exploring the latest innovations, trends, and challenges shaping the future of the discipline. Set in the vibrant city of London, it provides an excellent opportunity for networking, knowledge exchange, and collaboration among participants from around the world. Dates: July 18-20, 2025 Location: London, UK Venue: University of London Conference Highlights Global Networking Opportunities: Engage with leading educators, policymakers, industry experts, and researchers from across the globe to discuss emerging trends and transformative technologies in Psychology and Behavioral Sciences. Interactive Sessions and Discussions: Participate in thought-provoking panels and debates addressing key issues in the field, with a focus on fostering collaboration and innovative solutions. Publication Opportunities: Enhance your academic profile by publishing in the Conference Proceedings with an ISBN and DOI. Additionally, explore further opportunities in respected peer-reviewed journals and monographs. Explore London: Enjoy a complimentary one-day guided tour of London, offering a chance to discover its rich history, vibrant culture, and iconic architecture, while networking with fellow attendees. Important Dates Abstract Submission Deadline: June 27, 2025 Early Registration Deadline: February 12, 2025 Late Registration Deadline: July 08, 2025 Conference Dates: July 18-20, 2025
